attributes.action: act now to minimise immigration to Great Britain and withdraw British troops from overseas war zones for deployment on the nation's borders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We should minimise all immigration now.  We should locate and deport all illegal immigrants, send asylum seekers back whence they came and be brave enough to say that this is for the benefit of the country.  This is an English-speaking nation with traditions and cultures that are not the same as those of other countries and we must not allow the arguments of Political Correctness and Human Rights to destroy our heritage.

I believe that the acceptance of this petition and the adoption of the policy that it supports would give the public what it wants and would facilitate, as a minimum, the following benefits:

 Reduce the influx of undesirable aliens

 Reduce spread of disease and infection

 Reduce erosion of the nation's identity

 Reduce the threat of terrorism

 Reduce the housing shortage

 Reduce the prison population

 Reduce hospital waiting lists

 Reduce congestion on roads

 Reduce welfare expenditure 

 Reduce school class sizes 

 Reduce driving accidents

 Reduce unemployment

 Reduce crime rate

 Reduce taxes

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
